#### Overview

The [Sentinel-3 OLCI Level-2](https://sentinels.copernicus.eu/web/sentinel/user-guides/sentinel-3-olci/processing-levels/level-2){target='_blank'} product provides geophysical data that is derived from the Level-1 product. The level-2 land product provides land and atmospheric geophysical parameters computed for full and Reduced Resolution. The Level-2 product also includes data quality flags that provide information on the reliability of the geophysical parameters, as well as information on the atmospheric correction applied to the data. These flags can be used to filter out data that is not of sufficient quality for a particular application.
